entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 60
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 80
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH, INCREASING TO 40 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
